document.full_text: about 250 people are missing in the mediterranean after the vessels carrying them illegally to europe got into difficulty off the tunisian coast, a tunisian security official told reuters on thursday.
document.title: about 250 refugees missing in mediterranean
lines_and_colors: about 250 people are missing in the mediterranean after the vessels carrying them illegally to europe got into difficulty off the tunisian coast, a tunisian security official told reuters on thursday.
